citation.abstract: There are more than 5,000 species of mammals alive today and most people would argue that they are some of the most successful animals on Earth. But our research, published today, suggests that some mammals…
citation.title: The slow and fast steps to becoming a mammal

facebook.title: The slow and fast steps to becoming a mammal
facebook.summary:
Museum palaeontologist, Jennifer Botha-Brink, highlights some of the important developments and research methods used to understand the evolution of mammals in the following co-authored paper.
